Package games.negative.alumina.menu

Class ChestMenu

java.lang.Object
games.negative.alumina.menu.ChestMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
AluminaMenu
public abstract class ChestMenu extends Object implements AluminaMenu
Represents a intractable chest menu.
